CustomField.description: Number of months worth of open Opportunities to be created when using an open-ended Recurring Donation. Determined by the Last Payment Date field.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Number of months from today worth of open Opportunities to be created when using open-ended Recurring Donations. WARNING: Reducing this value will result in extra Opportunities being deleted. Increasing it will launch a batch process to add Opportunities
CustomField.label: Opportunity Forecast Months
